title: Earthquake strikes near San Francisco
content: A magnitude 6.0 earthquake struck near San Francisco on Wednesday morning, causing widespread damage and power outages.

title: Warriors defeat Celtics in Game 7 of NBA Finals
content: The Golden State Warriors defeated the Boston Celtics 103-90 in Game 7 of the NBA Finals to win their fourth championship in eight years.

title: New trailer for Stranger Things season 4 released
content: The new trailer for the fourth season of the popular Netflix show Stranger Things was released today, and it looks like it's going to be the scariest season yet.

title: Stock market closes down sharply after Fed interest rate hike
content: The stock market closed down sharply on Wednesday after the Federal Reserve raised interest rates by 0.75 percentage points.

title: Warriors to play Clippers tonight
content: The Golden State Warriors will play the Los Angeles Clippers at Chase Center tonight at 7:30 PM.

title: Tesla stock price drops after Elon Musk sells shares
content: The price of Tesla stock dropped on Wednesday after Elon Musk sold 7.92 million shares of the company.
